0.ngo_name: Drigung Kagyud International Meditation Centre Lamayuru Ladakh
0.Major_Activities1: The people of the area are ignorant about actual concept of Buddhism By organizing seminars and interpretation of Buddhas teaching by scholars in common language the people shall be able to understand the true meaning of Buddhas teaching and its relevance in day to day life Earlier people of the area believed in sacrificing animals to please the god There were several social evils prevailing among the people like polyandry system These elements and superstitious are now eradicated through

infor.issues_working_db: Art & Culture,Drinking Water,Education & Literacy,Health & Family Welfare,Vocational Training,

registeration_info.nr_orgName: Drigung Kagyud International Meditation Centre Lamayuru Ladakh

source_info.purpose:
During the financial year 2019-20, no grant was sanctioned by the Ministry, However the society has taken up the following works out of its own income generated through donations, Cultural shows and contributions from the members of the society.
1.	The society trained about 25 young boys and girls in singing of traditional songs, sung on the occasion of village famous festival the Choposrubla.
2.	The society also trained 10 local youths playing of traditional music i.e., Daman, Surna and Dangdan
